easy_translation: The Blessed Mother's Heart of Perfect Wisdom

བཅོམ་ལྡན་འདས་མ་ [Blessed Mother] 
ཤེས་རབ་ [wisdom] 
ཀྱི་ [of] 
ཕ་རོལ་ཏུ་ [perfection/other shore] 
ཕྱིན་པའི་ [gone to/perfected] 
སྙིང་པོ་ [heart/essence]
literal_translation: The Blessed Mother Heart of the Perfection of Wisdom
italian_easy_translation: Il Cuore della Perfezione della Saggezza della Madre Benedetta
italian_literal_translation: La Madre Benedetta Cuore della Perfezione della Saggezza

dpo_translation: In the language of India: Bhagavatīprajñāpāramitāhṛdaya.
ref_translation: In the language of India: Bhagavatī prajñāpāramitā hṛdaya
easy_translation: In Sanskrit: The Heart of Perfect Wisdom of the Blessed One
word_by_word_translation: རྒྱ་གར་ [Sanskrit/India] སྐད་དུ་ [in language] བྷ་ག་བ་ཏི་ [Bhagavatī] པྲ་ཛྙ་ [prajñā] པ་ར་མི་ཏཱྀ་ [pāramitā] ཧྲད་ཡ་ [hṛdaya]
italian_easy_translation: In sanscrito: Il Cuore della Perfetta Saggezza della Beata

dpo_translation: In the Tibetan language: Bhagavatī Prajñāpāramitāhṛdaya.
ref_translation: In the language of Tibet: Homage to the Perfection of Wisdom, the Blessed Mother!
easy_translation: In Tibetan: The Heart of the Blessed Mother Perfection of Wisdom
word_by_word_translation:
བོད་སྐད་དུ། [In Tibetan language] 
བཅོམ་ལྡན་འདས་མ་ [Blessed Mother] 
ཤེས་རབ་ [wisdom] 
ཀྱི་ [of] 
ཕ་རོལ་ཏུ་ [perfection/other shore] 
ཕྱིན་པའི་ [gone to/reached]

italian_literal_translation: Nella lingua tibetana: Il Cuore della Bhagavatī Prajñāpāramitā

dpo_translation: Thus have I heard at one time. The Blessed One was dwelling on Vulture Peak Mountain in Rājagṛha together with a great saṅgha of monks and a great saṅgha of bodhisattvas.
ref_translation: Thus did I hear at one time.The Blessed One was residing on Vulture Peak Mountain at Rājagṛha together with a great saṅgha of monks and a great saṅgha of bodhisattvas.
easy_translation: I heard this once. The Blessed One was staying on Vulture Peak Mountain near Rajagriha with a large group of monks and a large group of bodhisattvas.
word_by_word_translation:
འདི་སྐད་[thus] བདག་གིས་[by me] ཐོས་པ་[heard] དུས་[time] གཅིག་[one] ན་[at]། 
བཅོམ་ལྡན་འདས་[the Blessed One] རྒྱལ་པོའི་ཁབ་[Rajagriha] བྱ་རྒོད་ཕུང་པོའི་རི་[Vulture Peak Mountain] ལ་[on] དགེ་སློང་གི་[of monks] དགེ་འདུན་[assembly] ཆེན་པོ་[great] དང་[and]། བྱང་ཆུབ་སེམས་དཔའི་[of bodhisattvas] དགེ་འདུན་[assembly] ཆེན་པོ་[great] དང་[and] ཐབས་ཅིག་ཏུ་[together] བཞུགས་ཏེ་[was dwelling]།
literal_translation: Thus have I heard at one time. The Blessed One was dwelling on Vulture Peak Mountain in Rājagṛha together with a great assembly of monks and a great assembly of bodhisattvas.
italian_easy_translation: Ho sentito questo una volta. Il Beato si trovava sul Monte Picco dell'Avvoltoio vicino a Rajagriha insieme a un grande gruppo di monaci e un grande gruppo di bodhisattva.
italian_literal_translation: Così ho udito una volta. Il Beato dimorava sul Monte Picco dell'Avvoltoio a Rājagṛha insieme a una grande assemblea di monaci e una grande assemblea di bodhisattva.

dpo_translation: At that time, the Blessed One entered the absorption known as the Dharma discourse called the Appearance of the Profound.
ref_translation: At that time the Blessed One rested in an absorption on the categories of phenomena called illumination of the profound.
easy_translation: At that time, <Blessed One> went into a deep meditation called "Profound Appearance."
word_by_word_translation: དེའི་ཚེ་ (at that time) བཅོམ་ལྡན་འདས་ (Blessed One) ཟབ་མོ་ (profound) སྣང་བ་ (appearance) ཞེས་བྱ་བའི་ (called) ཆོས་ཀྱི་ (of Dharma) རྣམ་གྲངས་ཀྱི་ (of enumeration/categories) ཏིང་ངེ་འཛིན་ (meditative absorption) ལ་ (in/on) སྙོམས་པར་ (in equipoise) ཞུགས་སོ། ། (entered)
literal_translation: At that time, the Blessed One entered into equipoise in the meditative absorption of the Dharma enumeration called "Profound Appearance."
italian_easy_translation: In quel momento, il Beato entrò in una profonda meditazione chiamata "Apparizione Profonda."
italian_literal_translation: In quel momento, il Beato entrò in equanimità nell'assorbimento meditativo dell'enumerazione del Dharma chiamato "Apparizione Profonda."

dpo_translation: At that time, the bodhisattva great being noble Avalokiteśvara was looking at the profound conduct of the perfection of insight.
ref_translation: At the same time, the bodhisattva great being, noble Avalokiteśvara, while practicing the profound perfection of wisdom, looked and saw that the five aggregates are also empty of an intrinsic nature.
easy_translation: At that time, <Avalokiteshvara>, a noble great bodhisattva, was carefully examining the deep practice of wisdom.
word_by_word_translation: ཡང་ (again/moreover) དེའི་ཚེ་ (at that time) བྱང་ཆུབ་སེམས་དཔའ་ (bodhisattva) སེམས་དཔའ་ཆེན་པོ་ (great being) འཕགས་པ་ (noble) སྤྱན་རས་གཟིགས་དབང་ཕྱུག་ (Avalokiteshvara) ཤེས་རབ་ཀྱི་ (of wisdom) ཕ་རོལ་ཏུ་ (perfection) ཟབ་མོའི་ (profound) སྤྱོད་པ་ (conduct) ཉིད་ (itself) ལ་ (to) རྣམ་པར་ (thoroughly) བལྟ་ཞིང་ (looking)།
literal_translation: At that time, the bodhisattva great being noble Avalokiteshvara was thoroughly examining the profound conduct itself of the perfection of wisdom.
italian_easy_translation: In quel momento, il nobile grande bodhisattva <Avalokiteshvara> stava esaminando attentamente la profonda pratica della saggezza.
italian_literal_translation: In quel momento, il bodhisattva grande essere, il nobile Avalokiteshvara, stava esaminando completamente la profonda condotta stessa della perfezione della saggezza.

dpo_translation: They should also view the five aggregates as empty of inherent existence.
ref_translation: At the same time, the bodhisattva great being, noble Avalokiteśvara, while practicing the profound perfection of wisdom, looked and saw that the five aggregates are also empty of an intrinsic nature.
easy_translation: One should look at those five aggregates as being naturally empty.
word_by_word_translation: ཕུང་པོ་ (aggregates) ལྔ་པོ་ (five) དེ་དག་ (those) ལ་ (to/at) ཡང་ (also) རང་བཞིན་གྱིས་ (by nature/inherently) སྟོང་པར་ (empty) རྣམ་པར་ (completely/thoroughly) བལྟའོ (should view/look)།
literal_translation: One should thoroughly view those five aggregates as being empty by nature.
italian_easy_translation: Si dovrebbe osservare i cinque aggregati come naturalmente vuoti.
italian_literal_translation: Si dovrebbe contemplare completamente quei cinque aggregati come vuoti per natura.
